content: FYI @Alex Crichton @Eh2406 Cargo's CI will still be broken until https://github.com/rust-lang/rust/issues/74577 is fixed

Looks like the remove_dir_all that I added in https://github.com/rust-lang/cargo/pull/9419 is causing sporadic CI failures in collision_doc_sources. I don't have the energy to look at it right now, but I will try soon. CI will be flaky until then. I'm uncertain of the failure probability, hopefully it doesn't hurt rust-lang/rust too much.
